dcterms:creator: Q. Cao
L. Shen
W. Xie
O. Parkhi
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: A dataset for recognizing faces across various poses and ages, containing 3,310,000 face images from 8,631 train identities and 500 disjoint identities for testing.
dcterms:title: VGGFace2

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset created by adding facial masks to images from the VGGFace2 dataset, aimed at addressing the challenges of masked face recognition.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Masked Face Data (SMFD)

dcterms:description: A dataset collected for the Masked Face Recognition Competition, containing images of subjects with and without masks, used to evaluate masked face recognition systems.
dcterms:title: Masked Face Recognition Competition Dataset (MFRC-21)

dcterms:description: A dataset evaluated using the MFRC-21 dataset, containing real images of individuals wearing masks.
dcterms:title: Real Masked Face Data (RMFD)
